landingPage.title: Taiwan Watch
landingPage.description: Are your local representatives supportive of Taiwan? What are the Taiwan-related bills in Congress now? Check out Taiwan Watch and learn Taiwan affairs in Congress üòé
landingPage.newsContent: The U.S. Senate unanimously passed Taiwan Travel Act (HR535) on Feburary 28. Once the bill has been signed by the President, it will become the second-most political bill after Taiwan Relations Act.

billsPage.title: Bills
billsPage.description: What are the Taiwan-related bills in the current Congress? Let's find out! üîç
